source:
……お、あそこにいるのは甜花だな。
おーい！　甜花、おはよう！
translatedstr:
Oh, that’s Tenka over there.
Hey! Good morning, Tenka!

source:
あうっ！　……ぷ、プロデューサーさん……？
おはよう、ございます……
translatedstr:
Aww! ...... pu, producer ......?
Good morning, sir. ......

source:
わ、悪い、驚かせてしまったな……。
甜花、その……ルミナスでの活動はどうだ？
translatedstr:
Wow, my bad, you startled me. ......
Beet, how are you doing with that ...... luminous?

source:
る、ルミナスの……？　えっと……
人が……たくさん、いるの……緊張、するけど……
translatedstr:
I'd like to see ...... of Luminous? Um... ......
There are ...... a lot of people ...... nervous, but ......

source:
みんなと……仲良く、なれるように……
甜花、頑張る、ね……
translatedstr:
I hope to get along and be ...... good friends with everyone. ......
Tenka, good luck, right: ......

source:
そうか。その気持ちがあれば、きっと甜花なら仲良く
なれるよ。それじゃ、事務所まで一緒に行こうか
translatedstr:
Well, if you have that feeling, I'm sure Tenka would get along with you.
I can be...then let's go to the office together.

source:
う、うん……
にへへ、プロデューサーさんと、一緒……
translatedstr:
Umm, yeah ......
Nhehe, with the producer: ......

source:
おお、甜花、おはよう。
こんなところで会うなんて、奇遇だな
translatedstr:
Oh, beet blossom, good morning.
Odd that we meet at a place like this.

source:
おはよう……。にへへ……プロデューサーさんと、
会えた……。今日は……いい日……！
translatedstr:
Good morning ....... nihee ...... with the producer,
We met ....... Today is ...... a good day ......!

source:
はは、ありがとう……とゆっくりしたいところだけど
そろそろ急がないと遅刻だな、甜花も一緒に行くか？
translatedstr:
Haha, thanks ...... and I'd love to take my time.
It's time to hurry up, we're going to be late. Do you want to go with us, Tenka?

source:
う、うん！　甜花、頑張る……！
プロデューサーさん……はやく、事務所、行こ……！
translatedstr:
Ummm, yes! Tenka, good luck. ......
Producers ...... quickly, office, go ......!

source:
おお、そ、そこまで走らなくても……って、ん？
甜花、急に立ち止まって……どうしたんだ？
translatedstr:
Oh, well, you don't have to run that far, ......, hmm?
Beet, you suddenly stopped and ...... what's going on?

source:
あう……ぷ、プロデューサー、さん……
甜花、ＨＰ……使い切った……
translatedstr:
Au......p, producer, Ms. ......
Tenka, HP...... used up......

source:
え！？　だ、大丈夫か？　無理しなくていいからな。
甜花のペースで歩いていこう
translatedstr:
You don't have to force yourself.
Let's walk at the pace of the sugar beet.

source:
あうぅ……たくさんゲームしてたから……
寝不足だったかも……ごめんなさい…………
translatedstr:
Ahhhh ...... because I was playing so many games ......
Maybe I didn't get enough sleep. ...... sorry ............

source: ふう、今日もなんとか仕事が片付いたぞ
translatedstr: Whew, I managed to get some work done today.

source:
プロデューサーさん……お仕事、終わった？
今、平気……？
translatedstr:
Producers ...... work, are you done?
Are you okay now ......?

source:
甜花か、まだ残ってたんだな。
ちょうど終わったところだよ、どうかしたか？
translatedstr:
Tenka, or it's still there.
Just finished, what's wrong?

source:
え、えと……い、いつも、プロデュース……
してくれて、ありがと……ね……
translatedstr:
Eh, uh, ...... yes, always, produce ......
Thanks for doing this. ...... ......

source:
甜花……。こちらこそありがとう。
俺も、甜花の成長を間近で見れるのは、楽しいよ
translatedstr:
Tenka: ....... Thank you too.
I, too, enjoy watching Tenkas grow up close and personal.

source:
にへへ……。こ、これからも、甜花たちのこと……
よろしく、お願いしましゅ……！
translatedstr:
Nhehehe ....... This, and Tenka in the future ......
Best regards. ......

source:
あうぅ……噛んじゃった……
もう少しで……ちゃんと、言えたのに……
translatedstr:
Ahhhh ...... I bit it ......
I almost ...... could have said it right. ......

source:
はは、気持ちは十分伝わったよ。
これからも一緒に頑張っていこうな
translatedstr:
Haha, I got the feeling well enough.
Let's keep working together.

source:
ぷ、プロデューサーさん……
おはよう、ございます……
translatedstr:
Ps, Producer: ......
Good morning, sir. ......

source: お、おはよう……プロデューサーさん……
translatedstr: Oh, good morning ...... producer ......

source:
プロデューサーさん。
お仕事……お疲れ様です
translatedstr:
Producer.
Thanks for your work ......

source:
にへへ……今日、帰ったら、新しいゲーム、
する……
translatedstr:
Nhehehe ...... new game when I get home today,
Do ......

source:
（……甜花がひとりで休憩しているみたいだな。
声をかけてみるか）
translatedstr:
(...... Looks like Tenka is taking a break all by itself.
(Let's call out to her.)

source:
お疲れ様、甜花。
最近のルミナスの調子はどうだ？
translatedstr:
Good job, Tenka.
How's Luminous doing these days?

source:
ひゃい……！　あ……プロデューサーさん……
みんな、すごいアイドルで……甜花、圧倒される……
translatedstr:
Hi ......! Oh ...... producer ......
Everyone is an amazing idol and ...... Tenka, overwhelmed ......

source:
そうか。プロジェクトルミナスのメンバーは、
甜花よりも先輩のアイドルが多いもんな
translatedstr:
Right, the members of Project Luminous,
There are so many more senior idols than Tenka.

source:
うん……みんなの足……引っ張りたく、ない……
甜花、どうしたら……いい、かな……？
translatedstr:
Yeah ...... don't want to drag everyone down ......, no ......
Tenka, how can I ...... good, or ......?

source:
（やっぱり、甜花は上手くやれるか不安みたいだ。
ここはひとつ、何かアドバイスをしないと……）
translatedstr:
(After all, Tenka-chan seems to be worried about doing well.
I have to give some advice on one thing here: ......)

source: 自由にやる
translatedstr: do as one likes

source:
先輩の
言うことを聞く
translatedstr:
The senior
listen to what someone says

source: 顔色をうかがう
translatedstr: to watch one's looks

source:
そんなに気負わなくていいと思うぞ。
甜花には甜花のペースがあるし、自由にやればいいよ
translatedstr:
I don't think you need to get so worked up about it.
Beet has its own pace, and you're free to do what you want.

source:
自由……？　自由…………
わ、分かった……甜花、自由に……やってみる……！
translatedstr:
Freedom ......? Freedom ............
Wow, okay ...... Tenka, feel free to ...... try it ......!

source:
やっぱり、先輩の言うことを
聞くのが一番なんじゃないか？
translatedstr:
I knew it. I knew it. I knew what the seniors said.
Isn't it best to ask?

source:
そ、そっか……
先輩の、言うことを聞けば……大丈夫……
translatedstr:
I see. ......
Seniors, do what they say and you'll be fine ...... ......

source:
うーん……。それなら、なにかする時は
みんなの顔色をうかがうのはどうだろうか？
translatedstr:
Hmmm... ....... Then when you do something...
How about looking at everyone else's face?

source:
か、顔色……？
甜花……分かるかな……
translatedstr:
Or is it your complexion ......?
Tenka...... can you understand it? ......

source:
何にせよ、変に焦る必要はないんだ。
今はできることを、ひとつひとつやっていこうな
translatedstr:
Whatever it is, there's no need to be in a weird hurry.
Let's just do what we can for now, one thing at a time.

source:
う、うん……分かった……
プロデューサーさん……ありがと……！
translatedstr:
Umm, yeah ...... okay ......
Thanks to the producer ...... and ......!

source:
（ちょっと時間が空いたので、
事務所で甜花と雑談している……）
translatedstr:
(I have a little time on my hands,
(I'm chatting with a sugar beet in my office: ......)

source:
そういえば、他のメンバーとはどうだ？
仲良くなった人はいたりするのか？
translatedstr:
Come to think of it, how's it going with the rest of the group?
Are there any people you get along with?

source:
えと……。甜花たちと……
同じ、双子の……
translatedstr:
Let's see. ....... ...... with the sugar beets.
The same, twin ......

source:
ああ、亜美と真美か。
気が合いそうな話題といえば……
translatedstr:
Ah, Ami and Mami.
Speaking of topics we seem to be on the same page: ......

source: ゲーム
translatedstr: game

source: いたずら
translatedstr: pastime

source: 姉妹喧嘩
translatedstr: quarrel between sisters

source:
もしかしてゲームの話か？
甜花も、亜美も真美も、３人ともゲームが好きだしな
translatedstr:
Are we talking about a game by any chance?
And Tenka-chan, Ami and Mami, all three of them like to play games.

source:
うん……！　ふたりとも……ゲーム、好き……！
ゲームの話、できて……嬉しい……！　にへへ……
translatedstr:
Yeah ......! Both of us like ...... games, ......!
I'm ...... happy to talk about the game ......!

source:
まさか、いたずらの話とかか？　あのふたりの
いたずらは、どんどんパワーアップしてくるんだ……
translatedstr:
You're not talking about some kind of prank, are you? The two of them.
The pranks just keep getting more and more powerful. ......

source:
う、うん……甜花じゃ、思いつかない……いたずら、
いっぱい、考えてて……すごかった……！
translatedstr:
Umm, yeah ...... Tenka, I can't think of any ...... mischief,
I was thinking a lot and ...... was amazing ......!

source:
姉妹喧嘩の話とかか？　ただ、同じ双子でも
亜美たちと甜花たちは、またタイプが違うしな
translatedstr:
Like the story about the sisters fighting? Just the same twins, though.
Ami and her friends and Tenka-chan are a different type of people.

source:
うん……
ふたりは……よくする、みたい……
translatedstr:
Yeah ......
The two of them do ...... well, it seems. ......

source:
ふたりとも……そっくり……
でも、すごく、仲良し……！　そこは、おんなじ……
translatedstr:
They both look ...... exactly alike ......
But we are very, very good friends ......!

source:
そうだな。確かにそっくりだけど、亜美や真美にも
個性があるし、甜花や甘奈もそれぞれ違うしな
translatedstr:
Yes, they certainly look alike, but so do Ami and Mami.
They have their own personalities, and each beet or amana is different.

source:
うん……そっくりだけど……違う……
にへへ……楽しい、ね……！
translatedstr:
Yeah ...... looks exactly like ...... but ...... different ......
Nhehehe ...... fun, right ......!

source: ああ、これからもみんなで頑張っていこうな
translatedstr: Yeah, let's all keep up the good work.

source:
（甜花の仕事終わりに、休憩がてら
公園へ散歩に来ている）
translatedstr:
(At the end of the work day in Tenka-chan, I took a break.
(It's a walk in the park.)

source:
今日の甜花の仕事は、これでおしまいだな。
お疲れ様、ゆっくり休んでくれ
translatedstr:
I guess that's it for today's beet work.
Good job, get some rest.

source:
お疲れ様、です……。えと、プロデューサーさん……
最近、お休み……してる……？
translatedstr:
Good work, is ....... uh, producer ......
Have you been taking a break ...... lately ......?

source:
休みか？　たしかに最近は少し忙しかったな。
でも、次の休日は久々にゆっくり出来そうだよ
translatedstr:
You've been a little busy lately.
But it's going to be a long time since I've had a chance to relax on my next day off.

source:
よ、良かった……！　お休み、大事……！
お休み、いつも……どんなこと、してるの……？
translatedstr:
Good, good ......! Good night, important ......!
Good night, what do you always ...... do, ......?

source:
休みの日になにをしているか、か……。
うーん、そうだな……
translatedstr: What are you doing on your day off or .......

source: ネットショッピング
translatedstr: online shopping

source: 公園で歌う
translatedstr: Singing in the Park

source: 洗濯
translatedstr: laundry

source:
休みの日は、ネットで買い物することが多いかな。
この前、結構良いコーヒーメーカーを買ったんだ
translatedstr:
On my days off, I guess I do most of my shopping online.
I bought a pretty good coffee maker the other day.

source:
コーヒー……！　すごい……
プロデューサーさん、大人……！
translatedstr:
Coffee ......! Amazing ......
Producer, adult ......!

source:
休みの日は、晴れてれば公園で歌ったりしてるぞ。
みんながステージで歌う時の気持ちを、知りたくてな
translatedstr:
On my days off, if it's sunny, I'll be singing in the park.
I just wanted to know how you all feel when you sing on stage.

source:
こ、公園で、歌……！？　す、すごい……
甜花も、聞いてみたい……！
translatedstr:
This, in the park, singing...! ? That's amazing...
Tenka wants to hear it too...!

source:
休みの日は……主に洗濯してるな。
平日はしてる暇ないから、溜まっちゃうんだ……
translatedstr:
On your days off, you're ...... mainly doing laundry.
I don't have time to do it on weekdays, it just piles up. ......

source:
あうぅ……いつも……忙しい、から……？
お休み、もっと……ゆっくり、して……ほしい……
translatedstr:
Ahhh ...... always ...... busy, from ......?
Good night, more ...... relax, I want you to ...... relax, I want you to ......

source: 甜花は休みの時、何をしているんだ？
translatedstr: What does Tenka do on her days off?

source:
甜花……？　甜花は……お休みの日……
いつも、寝るか……ゲーム、してる……
translatedstr:
Tenka ......? Tenka is ...... closed ......
I'm always either sleeping or playing ...... games. ......

source: そうか、それも楽しそうだな
translatedstr: Okay, that sounds like fun too.

source:
そういえば今度、みんなで出かけるって話が
あるんだけど、甜花も一緒にどうだ？
translatedstr:
Oh, by the way, we talked about going out together sometime.
I have one. Would you like to join us, Tenka?

source:
み、みんなと、一緒……！？
うん……！　行く……！　にへへ、楽しみ……
translatedstr:
Mi, with everyone ......!
Yeah ......! I'm going ......! Hehehe, fun ......

source:
（甜花の仕事終わり、休憩を兼ねて、
カフェに立ち寄った……）
translatedstr:
(After work at Tenka, take a break,
(Stopped by the cafe ......)

source:
ぷ、プロデューサーさん……！
見て……！　和菓子、たくさん……！
translatedstr:
Ps, Producer: ......!
Look at ......! Japanese sweets, lots of ......!

source:
おお、本当だ。……なるほど、和菓子フェアか。
たまたま入ったカフェだったが、アタリだな
translatedstr:
Oh, it's true. ...... I see, a Japanese sweets fair.
It was just a cafe I happened to walk into, but it was a bite.

source:
にへへ……いろんな種類、ある……
どれも、美味しそう……あう……選び、きれない……
translatedstr:
Nhehehehe ...... there are many kinds, ......
They all look so good ...... that I can't choose one ...... that I can't get enough of. ......

source:
（甜花がいつになく目を輝かせている……。
この中で好きそうなのは……）
translatedstr:
(Tenka's eyes are shining brighter than ever at .......
(You might like this one: ......)

source: 甘納豆
translatedstr: sugared red beans

source: いちご大福
translatedstr: Daifuku Strawberry

source: お団子
translatedstr: dumpling (usu. sweet)

source: 甜花、この甘納豆とか、好きなんじゃないか？
translatedstr: Tenka, you might like this sweet bean or something like that.

source:
うん……！　名前、なーちゃん、みたいで……
甜花、甘納豆……好き……！　にへへ……
translatedstr:
Yeah ......! Name, Naa-chan, like ......
I like Tenka, sweet beans ...... like ......!

source:
このいちご大福なんか、甜花が好きそうだな。
大きないちごに、あんこもたくさんだ
translatedstr:
This strawberry Daifuku looks like something Tenka might like.
Big strawberries and lots of sweet bean paste!

source:
て、甜花、いちご大福……好き……！
ふわふわで……おいしくて……幸せに、なる……！
translatedstr:
Te, Tenka, strawberry daifuku ...... like ......!
Fluffy and ...... delicious and ...... happy, be ...... happy!

source:
このお団子とかどうだ？
いろんな味があって、おいしそうだぞ
translatedstr:
How about these dumplings?
They come in all kinds of flavors. They look delicious.

source:
ほんとだ……！　あうぅ……種類、いっぱい……
甜花、選べない……
translatedstr:
Really ......! Ahhh ...... kind of, a lot of ......
Tenka, can't choose: ......

source: はは、甜花は甘いものが大好きなんだな
translatedstr: Haha, Tenka must have a sweet tooth.

source:
お、どうやら持ち帰りもできるみたいだな。
甜花、事務所のみんなにお土産を買って帰ろうか
translatedstr:
Oh, apparently you can also take it home.
Tenka, let's go buy souvenirs for everyone in the office.

source:
うん……！　お土産……♪
にへへ、みんな、喜ぶ……かな……
translatedstr:
Yeah ......! Souvenirs ......♪
Heh heh, everyone, you'll be pleased: ...... or ......

source:
（甜花が自主レッスンしていると聞いたので、
少し様子を見に来た……）
translatedstr:
(I was told that Tenka-chan was giving self-guided lessons,
(I'm here to see how things are going a little ......)

source:
あ、プロデューサーさん……お疲れ様、です……。
お仕事……休憩中……？
translatedstr:
Oh, thank you for your hard work, producer ....... ......
Working ...... taking a break ......?

source:
ああ、お疲れ様。甜花も休憩中か……ん？
その飲み物やタオル、どうしたんだ？
translatedstr:
Oh, thanks for your help, is Beet Blossom taking a break too ...... hmmm?
What happened to those drinks and towels?

source:
にへへ……なーちゃんが、持ってきてくれた……！
なーちゃん、いつも……甜花を、助けてくれる……
translatedstr:
Nhehe ......Na-chan brought it to me ......!
Nah, always ...... Tenka, always ...... helping me out!

source:
そうだったのか、相変わらず気が利くな。
さすが、甘奈は……
translatedstr:
Oh, that's right, you're as witty as ever.
As expected, Amana is ......

source: 妹の鑑だな
translatedstr: You're a great sister.

source: お母さんみたいだな
translatedstr: You sound like your mother.

source: お姉さんみたいだな
translatedstr: You look like your sister.

source:
妹の鑑だな！
いい妹で良かったな、甜花
translatedstr:
You're a great sister!
You're lucky to have a good sister, Tenka.

source:
うん……！
なーちゃんは、優しくて……頼りになる……
translatedstr:
Yeah. ......!
Naachan is kind and ...... reliable ......

source: まるでお母さんみたいだな
translatedstr: You sound like your mother.

source:
あうぅ……。甜花、ずっと……
なーちゃんに、頼ってた……から……
translatedstr:
Ahhhh ....... Tenka, all the way to ......
To Nachan, I was relying on ...... to ......

source: お姉さんみたいだな
translatedstr: You look like your sister.

source:
うん……なーちゃん、昔から……
甜花より、なんでも……上手……
translatedstr:
Yeah ...... Nah, I've always been a ......
Anything ...... better than Tenka ......

source:
なーちゃん……今、すごく頑張ってる……
甜花も……なーちゃんの隣、いたい……
translatedstr:
Naachan ...... is working very hard right now ......
Tenka-chan also ...... next to Nachan, I want to ......

source:
……なるほど、それで自主レッスンしてたのか。
お互いを思い合って頑張っているんだな、えらいぞ
translatedstr:
...... I see, so that's why you were doing your own lessons.
You're doing a great job of looking out for each other.

source:
にへへ……甜花、なーちゃんと一緒に頑張る……
プロデューサーさんも……見ててね
translatedstr:
Nhehehe ...... Beetika, I'll do my best with Na-chan ......
Producers, too, watch ......

source:
（甜花の仕事終わり、甜花がゲームショップに
行くと言うので、同行することにした）
translatedstr:
(At the end of the work day, Tenka was in the game store.
(She said he was going, so I decided to accompany her.)

source:
にへへ……新しいゲーム、買うの楽しみ……♪
でも、ちょっと……足、疲れた……
translatedstr: But I'm a little ...... foot, tired ......

source:
仕事が終わってからそのまま来たもんな。
飲み物でも買ってくるから、少し休憩しようか
translatedstr:
You came straight here after work.
I'll get you something to drink. Let's take a break.

source: （さて、どれにしようかな……）
translatedstr: (Well, which one shall I choose ......)

source: お汁粉
translatedstr: sweet red-bean soup

source: 牛乳
translatedstr: (cow's) milk

source: コーヒー
translatedstr: coffee

source: 甜花、飲み物を買ってきたぞ
translatedstr: Tenka, I got you a drink.

source:
お汁粉……！
にへへ……プロデューサーさん、ありがと……！
translatedstr:
Oshiruko: ......!
Nhehehe ...... producer, thanks ......!

source: （よし、すごく喜んでるな……！）
translatedstr: (Okay, you're very happy. ......!)

source: 甜花、飲み物を買ってきたぞ
translatedstr: Tenka, I got you a drink.

source: プロデューサーさん……ありがと……
translatedstr: Thanks to the producer ...... ......

source: （ふう、喜んでもらえたみたいだ）
translatedstr: (Wind, you seem pleased.)

translatedstr: About myself

source: 趣味について
translatedstr: About Hobbies

source: 甘奈について
translatedstr: About Amana

source: ルミナスについて
translatedstr: About Luminous

source:
自分について話すのはどうだ？
ファンのみんなも、甜花自身の話を聞きたいはずだ
translatedstr:
How about we talk about ourselves?
I'm sure all the fans would love to hear from Tenka herself.

source:
じ、自分の、話……
えっと……好きな、ゲーム……とか……？
translatedstr:
Ji, my, story ......
Let's see, I like ......, games ...... or ......?

source:
そうだな。それから、甜花がアイドルとして
感じたこととか、自分の気持ちも話すといいな
translatedstr:
Yes, and then there's the fact that the sugar beet is an idol.
I hope you talk about how you feel and how you feel too.

source:
そっか……それなら、甜花……話せる、かも……！
甜花……頑張る、ね……！
translatedstr:
I see...... then you can talk about Tenka......, maybe......!
Tenka ...... good luck, right ......!

source:
にへへ……プロデューサーさん……
話、聞いてくれて……ありがと……
translatedstr:
Nhehehe ...... producer ......
Thanks ...... for listening to me ......

source:
（イベントでは甜花なりに、アイドルを通して
感じた気持ちを素直に話した）
translatedstr:
(At the event, in her own way, through the idol
(I spoke honestly about how I felt.)

source:
（ファンも聞きたかった話が聞けて大満足の大喜び。
イベントは大いに盛り上がったぞ！）
translatedstr:
(Fans were also very happy and delighted to hear what they wanted to hear.
The event was a blast!)

source:
趣味の話をするのはどうだ？
甜花の好きな話が聞けたらファンを嬉しいだろうし
translatedstr:
How about we talk about hobbies?
It would make the fans happy to hear what you like to hear about Tenka.

source:
じゃあ、甜花……いつも、してること……
お話、しようかな……
translatedstr:
Then Tenka ...... always, what we do ......
Let's talk, let's talk: ......

source:
ゲームの、話……ばっかりに、なっちゃうかも……
あ、あと……デビ太郎のこと、話す……！
translatedstr:
I might end up talking about games all the time ...... ......
Oh, and ...... Debitaro, I'll talk to you about ......!

source:
（イベントでは甜花の好きな話をたくさん話し、
ファンのみんなは満足してくれたぞ！）
translatedstr:
(At the event, we talked a lot about what we like about Tenka,
Your fans were happy!)

source:
甘奈の話なんてどうだ？
ふたりで支え合って頑張ってきたわけだしな
translatedstr:
How about a story about Amana?
We've both worked hard and supported each other.

source:
な、なーちゃんの、お話……しても、いいの……？
で、でも……それで、いいの……かな……？
translatedstr:
Hey, naa-chan, can I tell you a story ......?
So, but ......, is that right ...... or ......?

source:
（イベント当日、甜花は甘奈について
いろんな話をした）
translatedstr:
(On the day of the event, Tianhua talked about Ganna
(We talked about many things.)

source:
（内容は良かったが、甜花のことについて
聞きたかったファンには不満だったようだ……）
translatedstr:
(The content was good, but about the sugar beets.
(Fans who wanted to hear it were not happy: ......)

source:
ルミナスのみんなの話はどうだ？
人見知りだった甜花の成長を見せるいい機会だ
translatedstr:
What about all the folks at Luminous?
A good opportunity to show the growth of our once shy sugar beet.

source:
わ、わかった……
甜花、頑張って……みんなのこと、話す……
translatedstr:
Wow, okay. ......
Tenka, good luck ...... talking about everyone ......

source:
（その後、甜花はプロジェクトルミナスの
メンバーとの思い出を話した）
translatedstr:
(Subsequently, Tenka was the Project Luminous's
(She spoke of her memories of the members.)

source:
（内容は悪くなかったが、甜花のことについて
聞きたかったファンは満足できなかったようだ）
translatedstr:
(The content wasn't bad, but about Tenka.
(Apparently the fans who wanted to hear it weren't satisfied.)

source: （今回の仕事は成功だ！）
translatedstr: (This job was a success!)

source: （今回の仕事は失敗だ。次こそは！）
translatedstr: （This job was a mistake...next time!)
